mapper.select:
select
from city_code
and id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and city_code like "%${cityCode}%"
and city_name like "%${cityName}%"
and parent_code like "%${parentCode}%"
and type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into city_code (city_code, city_name, parent_code, type) values (#{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into city_code
city_code,
city_name,
parent_code,
type,
#{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{parentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update city_code
city_code = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city_name = #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parent_code = #{parentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
